thread.title: Anushka Sharma’s Already Wearing The Best Outfit For This Weekend
thread.title_full: Anushka Sharma’s Already Wearing The Best Outfit For This Weekend

author: Natasha Patel
title: Anushka Sharma’s Already Wearing The Best Outfit For This Weekend
text:
Natasha Patel Mar . 10 . 2017 Anushka Sharma 
While keeping in line with Pantone’s colour of the year, Anushka Sharma took her causal look to another level—a very green level… Wearing white and khaki , Ms Sharma’s ootn looked as adorbs as she did. We really love that she kept the accessorising and colours to a minimum and let the monotone style speak for itself. 
P.S – We want that jacket NOW! 
Also, how amazing is her LWD she wore a couple of days ago? Cutie x 100! A post shared by Allia Al Rufai (@alliaalrufai) on Mar 9, 2017 at 4:27am PST 
Which outfit did you love more? 0
